Sunhawk continues to whisper to himself.

Sunhawk:  Bye bye.

He sends another laser beam at the exact middle of
Drillbits head.

--- RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He drilled lower just as the laser blast passed over
> him. He could feel the heat from the beam. He pops
> out of the hole.
> "Who the hell just shot at me? DrillBit, TERRORIZE!"
> He transformes to bot mode, his gattaling gun ready.
> "Did you guys see where that came from?"
>
